item.title: Trees overhanging the road hindering the refuse lorries, 12th August
item.description:
Overheight trees obstructing the road at 4 New Road, Brockhampton. The recycing and rubbish lorries are struggling to access the lane. Property owner not available to discuss.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5 New Row, Park Lane, Sevenhampton, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street lights permanently out, 12th August
item.description:
Street lights in Heron Close, and in Hatherley Road (to the right and left of the Heron Close junction) have not worked since Thursday 7th August 2025. Previously, these same lights did not work from 18th June to 14th July 2025. This problem was reported on 7th July Ref: 7820573
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Heron Close, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: There are three (3) Large Potholes by the Parking area for the shops in Chosen Drive, 12th August
item.description:
The potholes 3 in number are situated along the car parking area of Chosen Drive by the shops nearest John Daniels Turning
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chosen Drive, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
